abstract: Former California State Sen Leland Yee receives five year prison sentence on bribery and weapons charges, which he admitted to in plea deal.
lead_paragraph: Former State Senator Leland Yee was sentenced Wednesday to five years in prison in a plea deal on bribery and weapons charges

headline.main: California: Ex-Senator Gets 5 Years for Taking Bribes
headline.print_headline: California: Ex-Senator Gets 5 Years for Taking Bribes

snippet: Former State Senator Leland Yee was sentenced Wednesday to five years in prison in a plea deal on bribery and weapons charges
